data.text: @Baligirl11 Hi. Could you provide me some details about your concern via DM so we can look this for you? Thanks - H
@kamibels Hi, I've responded to your DM. Please check your inbox. Regards, Rona
@kamibels Hi There, Could you please DM us your booking reference so we can assist further? Regards- Maye
@Cha_deBerry Hi Charlotte,  I’m sorry to hear this. Could you please DM your booking reference so I can look into this for you? - Cheeni
@Cha_deBerry Hi Charlotte, we are offering a destination change, or a voucher to the value of your booking. https://t.co/aND4RYacsi
@Cha_deBerry Hi Charlotte, you can find all the recovery options here : https://t.co/m2Iu0G7ERe
@dreeebvss Glad she got a bargain! - Emily
@Twin1003 Hey Ineke, please request your friend contact us directly. We will see what has happened! - Emily
@JMurph04 It’s still scheduled to depart and we’ll notify you if your flight is affected. Please see updates here: https://t.co/l8P5Iwv4HX
@herbdown99 Hi Herbert, Denpasar Airport is closed today. We will not be operating. https://t.co/aND4RYacsi
@furney Hi Jo, all our options that are available can be found via our Travel Alerts page. https://t.co/aND4RYacsi
@craigasauros Hey Craig! So happy Kim could help! Could you DM your booking reference? I'll pass it on to her Manager. - Emily
@screwthecubicle Hi Lydia, how can we assist? - Emily
@reecemcdonald93 Hi Reece, could you please DM the email address you used in your booking so I can looked into this? Thanks, Cheeni
@reecemcdonald93 Hi Reece, I’m sorry to hear about this. Could you please DM your booking reference so I can look into this for you? - Maye
@beevanglsta Hi Bea. How can we help you? Thanks - Marvin
@luvkumarjain We don’t advise posting of your booking details publicly. You may want to send us DM so we can look it up for you. Thanks - H
@CSchliesser Thanks for your feedback. Rest assured we will keep on updating Jetstar Travel Alert page. Regards, Cheeni
@furney Hi Jo, Please check your inbox. I’ve responded to your DM. Thanks - Rona
@effs Sorry to hear this Farhan. Could you DM more details of your concern and we’ll see how can we assist. Thanks - Hazel
@lloydthelostboy Hey Lloyd, glad to see you enjoyed the launch! - Emily
@ladykaeru Sorry to hear this. Are you able to DM us your booking reference so we could take a look? Thanks –Kelly
@axiiturri Hey Asier, I have replied to your DM. - Emily
@KancaMangino HI Juan, thanks for getting in touch. Could you DM your booking reference? - Emily
@florence_finel our LiveChat team can be found here : https://t.co/UarlwGGJrW - Emily

data.text: @florence_finel  Hi Florence, All our contact numbers can be found here : https://t.co/UarlwGGJrW or 1/2
@CSchliesser Hi Charlie, apologies - Australian updates can also be found here : https://t.co/wQFaUoJpfG
@CSchliesser Hi Charlie, all updates can be found here : https://t.co/CSxchk98JR - Emily
@luvkumarjain Hi Lavanya, were trying to get everyone home as soon as possible. But safety is our number one priority. - Emily

data.text: @bobbywrahardjo I’m sorry to hear about your delayed flight. Could you please DM your booking reference so I can look into for you? -Mearth
@luvkumarjain Sorry for this. Could you please DM your booking reference so I can check this further and see how I can assist? Thanks –Irish
@kayestalkstalks Hey Kaye, you can find our updates here : https://t.co/CSxchk98JR
@kelvl  will need to pay for the booking will default to the currency of the Country you will be departing from. Regards - Cheeni 2/2
@kelvl It may help to know whenever you make a booking with Jetstar, via our website or through our Contact Centre, the currency you 1/2
@ladykaeru Please keep an eye out on our travel updates : https://t.co/aND4RYacsi if your flight is affected we will be in touch with option
@blahxxdaf Hey D, could you DM your booking reference? I'll check for you. - Emily
@itsmevickie25 Hi there, you can make a name change on your booking here : https://t.co/d0Hga1NO51
@earlyw0rms Hi Earl - i'd really like to check this for you. Could you please DM your booking reference?
@JenniValtiala Hi Jenni, all updates can be found here : https://t.co/aND4RYacsi
@devslashpaul Hey Paul, flights are running as normal now. Please see here : https://t.co/aND4RYacsi
@nosirroMannA  I can advise that some of our flights to Bali today is operating as normal. Hence, we still offer flights to Bali. –Jayme
@aayan_Amr 2/2 and they have successfully arrested the offender.
@aayan_Amr 1/2 Jetstar is aware of this video circulating online. This incident have been investigated with Airports of Thailand
@faqruddins 2/2 Unfortunately, while we aim to check everyone in delays can still occur.
@faqruddins 1/1 We consistently monitor our staff levels at peak periods and are training new staff to cut down waiting times.
@barefootthink Hi Heather, you may reach our Live Chat team to change your flight via this link: https://t.co/FoWoms1Uih -Irish
@SusanHayes_ Hi Susan, thanks for flying with Jetstar. Hope you had a great flight from Da Nang to Ho Chin Minh City. -Irish

data.text: @florence_finel Hey Florence, I have responded to your DM. - Emily
@patootays Hey! Sorry to hear this. Could you DM some more info? I'll see how I can assist. :)
@aimtrepinoy Yay! Glad you love the feature Yagit 😄 have a lovely time in back home for Christmas. 🎅🎄 - Emily
@jessiewee Hey Jessie! Sorry to hear you had a disappointing experience. If you'd like to provide more feedback, please DM the details. :)
@c_behrens Thanks for your feedback Christian. I'll make sure to include this in my report to our leadership. Thanks - Krish
@c_behrens Sorry to hear this Christian. I suggest clearing your browsing cookies and cache or use a different browser. Thanks - Krish
@JervinKent Hi JK, I’m sorry to hear this, Could you DM us the email address you’ve used in booking your flight?-Sol
@captincool Hi Cloe, could you please DM your booking reference and more info? - Emily
@denis_akgun Hey Denis, all our deals can be found here : https://t.co/yGeu9fhZeA
@donthrice Hi Dontoro, were you able to book? Would you mind sending me a DM with your booking reference? Thanks. - Emily
@LocalSauceBoss Hope you have a great flight Sauce Boss! See you on board! 😄
@donthrice If your booking is needed imminently our Live Chat team can assist with booking. Just advise of the error you have received. - A
@donthrice Hi DonToro, Sorry to hear about this. I have passed on the feedback and screenshot to our web team for investigation. 1/2
@eunice_simbar country's regulation. Given that we are only a tenant of the airport, we have no control over their policies. -Camille 2/2
@eunice_simbar We have no other options to settle for payments at Jakarta airport except for cash. This is in accordance with their 1/2
@KhekLim Hi Khek, could you send us your booking reference number via DM? We'll see how we can assist. -Camille

data.text: @agoengsamadi Sorry to hear your flight is delayed. We hope to have you on your way soon. Please see here: https://t.co/bippLEBaNS -J
@captincool Hi Cloe, our website is designed to guide you through the booking process and gives you the actual number of customers in it. -J
@ElaineS18293636 Hey, I've responded to your DM with further details. Thanks - Lee
@johendry93 Hey John, you can check always check the status of your flight via this link - https://t.co/bippLEBaNS. Thanks - Lee
@captincool Hello Cloe, thanks for the tag. Lots of people are taking advantage on our fares, we hope to see you on-board soon! - Lee
@gianwanders Thanks for the tag. Hope to welcome you on-board a Jetstar flight in the future.
@Matthew19649060 You can also check the status of your flight using our Flight Status page here: https://t.co/BvsWoPGXZL. -Camille 2/2
@Matthew19649060 Hi Matthew, I've checked this and I have confirmed that flight 3K765 to Manila is still scheduled to depart at 4:35 PM. 1/2
@DirkBRM page here: https://t.co/R4khUtPgTP to check the status of our flights. :) -Camille
@DirkBRM Hi, I can see that 3K763 has departed Singapore at 2:48AM. For reference, you can also check our Flight Status 1/2
@sherwinsu  all times. I'd advise calling the attention of our staff so they can make you feel more comfortable during your flight. 2/2 -Cam
@sherwinsu We train our staff to be considerate of everyone’s needs & require them to provide professional, polite & friendly service at 1/2
@ms_crissy It’s not necessary but you may update your passport number by contacting our Live Chat team here  https://t.co/W7BsbAug8v - Krish
@nadiarry 2/2 read and understand the type of fare you want to purchase. See https://t.co/K0j3jzpu5Z for more information.
@nadiarry 1/2 Our fare rules are outlined during the booking process. Before you can confirm your booking, you’ll need to agree that you’ve
@vinamelody Hi Vina, could you send us your email address via DM so we can check this? -Camille
@dctrjack 2/2 flights with hot drinks. Thanks - Lee
@dctrjack 1/2 Hi Jackson. Due to the risk of spillages, along with health and safety concerns, we do ask passengers not to board Jetstar
@nadiarry 2/2 will be forfeited if cancelled. See here https://t.co/PzhOyB06N9 for further details. Thanks - Lee
@nadiarry 1/2 Hey Nadia. If you have booked a non-refundable fare, we won't be able to provide a refund or credit for your flight, as it
@vinamelody  Sorry to hear this. Sometimes it helps to clear your cache and internet browser history. Do let us know how you go. - Lee
@belleye Hey, thanks for the tag and for sharing this photo. Hope you enjoyed your trip! :) Cheers - Lee
@91lines  For me to check this out, please send me a DM with your complete name and the email address you used to book the flight. - Irish
@triciamallari Hey Tri, could you DM us your booking reference and the email address used so we can look into this for you. Thanks - Lee
@DanielPedro91 Happy to hear this Daniel :)
@JJulb1957 Hey Julie, thanks for the tag. Hope you'll enjoy flight! :) Cheers - Lee
@bite4size Hi. Could you DM us your booking reference so I can look into this for you and see how we can assist. Thanks - Lee
@timothy_mcd Hey, it may take some time for them to investigate but rest assured that you'll receive a response from them via email soon. L
@steviesrojas Hey Steview, thanks for the shout out. We look forward to welcome you on-board soon! :) Thanks - Lee
@bite4size Hey Jenna, sorry to hear this. You can contact our Telephone Reservations team here https://t.co/E7th0ojVpn. Thanks - Lee
@bite4size 2/2 here https://t.co/yPkuTwbAQn for further details. Thanks - Lee
@bite4size 1/2 Hey Jenna, please contact us here https://t.co/5Cj0JGNGJM so we can further assist you with your service dog. Check
@phil31753 this so everyone has space onboard and ensure that our flights get away on time. Sorry for any inconvenience caused. 2/2 -J
@phil31753 We have a team of cabin baggage officers making sure customers are boarding with the correct amount of luggage. We’re doing 1/2
@phil31753 3/3  on all of our flights - https://t.co/BIDltTXKPa. Thanks - Lee
@phil31753 2/3 of their day-to-day role and it would be impractical for us to expect them to weigh and measure every piece of baggage
@phil31753 1/3 Hello Phil. While we would always want our staff to be consistent, policing cabin baggage is generally a very small part
